title: Game just kicked me while i was 4/0 cant rejoin now i have to take a loss and a leavebuster???
body: Im in the middle of a game doing well, game crashed and now client doesnt have a reconnect button???? An entire fucking joke that i lose mmr and elo off of this.

replies.body: If the client never gave you a chance to reconnect, it's likely the game crashed entirely and everyone else was booted out of the match as well. If that's the case, you won't actually be hit with any penalties and you should have been able to requeue immediately afterward.
